attributes.description: Brand New Condition, Central Locking with a Full Service History! BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of the vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our valued customers. For Excellent Service Contact our Sales Manager – Linden Jacobs As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully-fledged automotive dealer group offers New Cars, Used Cars, Parts, and services to all existing and potential customers. With us, you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership. To find out more about this vehicle, contact the dealer now.
